result.title: Statement not available
result.content:
Hello everyone,

Today while I was proceeding through ladder B in a2oj.com I faced "Statement is not available on English language" in 14B - Young Photographer, I also tried switching to the Russian version so that I could use Google translator but I faced the same issue.I also faced this issue in 3C - Tic-tac-toe and 3B - Lorry.

I hope this will be fixed soon.
